overview: Mr. Sloan is a rich guy who is headed for a big ol' tax bill unless he can come up with a substantial tax loss. His accountant suggests that he give one of his most profitable ventures, a Malibu health spa, to its buff and horny employees. When the ladies get the news, they're so excited they start screwing everybody in sight.
tagline: Work it out... The Malibu Way!
title: Malibu Spice
